title: Create a Case Budget
description: A client has requested a budget for a new litigation matter. A senior associate needs to create a phased budget.

tasks.description: Break the litigation into phases (e.g., 'Initial Pleadings', 'Discovery', 'Summary Judgment', 'Trial').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a structured outline of the case lifecycle.

tasks.description: For each phase, estimate the number of attorney and paralegal hours required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent estimates the time commitment for each phase.

tasks.description: Using the firm's billing rates, calculate the estimated legal fees for each phase and the total estimated cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed budget spreadsheet.
